sense.gloss: sensitivity (e.g. of a measuring instrument), reception (radio, TV, etc.)

sdata.e: You ought to get to work on time.

sdata.e: I admire you for your courage.

sdata.e: The train was delayed, so I could not arrive there on time.

sdata.j: ↑奇跡↑↓きせき↓が↑起↑↓お↓こらない↑限↑↓かぎ↓り、それを↑時間↑↓じ|かん↓↑通↑↓ど|お↓りにやることはできないだろう。
sdata.e: Unless there is a miracle, we won't be able to make it on time.
